meanings.sent1: The car was sudsy after the kids washed it.
meanings.sent2: The sink was sudsy with bubbles from the dish soap.
meanings.sent3: The dog looked sudsy after rolling in the foam at the car wash.
meanings.sent4: The sky turned sudsy as the clouds mixed with the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: Her hands felt sudsy as she scrubbed the dishes clean.

meanings.sent1: The sudsy detergent quickly cleaned the greasy pan.
meanings.sent2: The washing machine was sudsy during the rinse cycle.
meanings.sent3: The sudsy fountain in the park delighted the children on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The river water appeared sudsy as it rushed over the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The sudsy bath bubbles tickled her nose as she soaked in the tub.
